title: Global Head of Strategy & AI Solutions
bio: As Global Head of Strategy & AI Solutions at Google Cloud, Sharad manages a portfolio of over $XXB+ and leads high-impact initiatives, enterprise negotiations, and multi-billion-dollar transformation programs that help organizations harness Cloud, AI, and automation at scale. With 25 years in the tech industry, primarily at Big Tech leaders such as Google and IBM, he works closely with C-suite executives to shape global strategy and architect technology adoption frameworks that keep enterprises ahead of disruption.
